Verses: 1 naan Thirumbavum En Kangalai Ereduththu, Idho, Irandu Parvadhangalin Naduvaagap Purappattuvarugira Naalu Radhangalaik Kanden; Andhap Parvadhangal Vengalap Parvadhangalaayirundhana.
2 mudhalaam Radhaththil Sivappukkudhiraigalum, Irandaam Radhaththil Karuppuk Kudhiraigalum,
3 moondraam Radhaththil Vellaikkudhiraigalum, Naangaam Radhaththil Pullipulliyaana Sivappukkudhiraigalum Poottiyirundhana.
4 naan Ennode Pesina Thoodhanai Nokki: Aandavane, Ivaigal Ennavendru Ketten.
5 andhath Thoodhan Enakkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ivaigal Sarvalogaththukkum Aandavaraayirukkiravarudaiya Samugaththil Nindru Purappadugira Vaanaththinudaiya Naalu Aavigal Endraar.

6 ondril Poottappattirundha Karuppukkudhiraigal Vadadhesaththukkup Purappattuppoyina; Venmaiyaana Kudhiraigal Avaigalin Pinnaale Purappattuppoyina; Pulli Pulliyaana Kudhiraigal Thendhesaththukkup Purappattuppoyina.
7 sivappuk Kudhiraigalovendraal Purappattuppoi, Boomiyile Sutriththiriyumpadi Kettukkondana; Adharku Avar: Poi Boomiyil Sutriththiriyungal Endraar; Appadiye Boomiyile Sutriththirindhana.
8 pinbu Avar Ennaik Kooppittu; Paar, Vadadhesaththukkup Purappattupponavaigal, Vadadhesaththile En Kobaththai Saandhipannitru Endru Ennode Sonnaar.
9 pinbu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
10 siraiyiruppin Manusharaagiya Eldhaayum, Thobiyaavum, Yedhaayaavum Baabilonilirundhu Vandhirukkum Annaalile Nee Poi, Seppaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yosiyaavin Veettukkul Pravesiththu,
11 ange Avargal Kaiyile Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Vaangi, Kreedangalai Seyviththu Yodhsadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Pradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Sirasile Vaiththu,

12 avanode Sollavendiyadhu: Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Oru Purushan, Avarudaiya Naamam Kilai Ennappadum; Avar Thammudaiya Sthaanaththilirundhu Mulaiththezhumbik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattuvaar.

13 avare Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattuvaar; Avar Magimaiporundhinavaraai, Thammudaiya Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirundhu Aalugai Seyvaar; Thammudaiya Singaasanaththinmel Aasaariyaraayum Iruppaar; Ivvirandin Naduvaaga Samaadhaanaththin Aalosanai Vilangum.
14 indhak Kreedangalovendraal, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile, Elemukkum, Thobiyaavukkum, Yedhaayaavukkum, Seppaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Enukkum Ninaippoottudhalukkendru Vaikkappaduvadhaaga.

15 dhooraththilullavargal Vandhu Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaikkooda Irundhu Kattuvaargal; Appozhudhu Senaigalin Karththar Ennai Ungalidaththirku Anuppinaarendru Arindhukolveergal; Neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththaikkettu Nadandheergalaanaal Idhu Niraiverum Endru Sol Endraar.
